merit_scholarships.name: Stamps Eminence Scholarship Program
merit_scholarships.amount: Full COA (tuition, fees, room, board, plus $5,000 enrichment grant)
merit_scholarships.requirements: Stamps Eminence Application (Essay, Video), Virtual Interview, Stamps Eminence Finalist Friday

honors_program.name: University Honors Program
honors_program.description: The University Honors Program promotes the intellectual and personal development of undergraduate students through an enriched academic experience and integration of curricular and co-curricular programming. Honors students can take advantage of honors status in 200+ majors across campus.
